DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare aesthetic result two different type suture ( subcuticular versus synthetic glue ) post-thyroidectomy incision . It randomize clinical trial ( single blind ) design superiority study , since author ' hypothesis glue give good result compare subcuticular suture particular district . Secondary objective investigate factor ( like use cold/warm blade , sex , presence diabetes , lenght incision ) influence aesthetic result .
